articles.author: Tucker Reals
articles.title: Imran Khan, former Pakistan leader and cricket star, shot in "clear assassination attempt"
articles.description: Aides of the divisive politician, who was ousted as PM earlier this year but is trying hard to make a comeback, say his wounds are not life-threatening.
articles.content: Pakistan's cricket star-turned prime minister Imran Khan was shot on Thursday as an assailant opened fire on his vehicle in an apparent assassination attempt. Representatives for the ex-premier told … [+2258 chars]

articles.title: Pakistan beat South Africa to boost slim hopes
articles.description: Pakistan boost their slim hopes of progressing in the T20 World Cup with a brilliantly frenetic fightback against South Africa at the Sydney Cricket Ground.
articles.content:
ICC Men's T20 World Cup Group 2, Sydney
Pakistan 185-9 (20 overs): Shadab 52 (22), Iftikhar 51 (35); Nortje 4-41

articles.title: Cricket legend Imran Khan shot
articles.description: Former Pakistan prime minister Imran Khan, who first rose to fame as one of the nation’s greatest cricketers, has been shot in the leg during an alleged gun attack, according to multiple reports.
articles.content:
Former Pakistan prime minister Imran Khan, who first rose to fame as one of the nation’s greatest cricketers, has been shot in the leg during an alleged gun attack, according to multiple reports.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
